name: Gravity Sling
description:
Gravity sling is an endless runner arcade game where you must accurately time when to use gravitational pull of planets to orbit around and get to the next planet. The pace picks up over time and planets become bigger making it harder as you get further.

I made this game in 3rd year of University as part of one of my modules, I then released this later once I had polished it up and added leader boards to the game.

To play you will need an android device and to download from the Google Play Store, which I have linked on this page.
